Package com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.cache

This package contains the UPA Value Add Cache.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CacheError
    Many of the UPA ValueAdd Cache Package methods take a parameter for returning detailed error information.
    PayloadCache
    PayloadCache is a collection of PayloadEntry instances that use the same DataDictionary.
    PayloadCacheConfigOptions
    Configuration options used when creating a PayloadCache instance.
    PayloadCursor
    PayloadCursor is a utility class to allow retrieving encoded data in multiple parts from a cache payload entry.
    PayloadEntry
    PayloadEntry stores the last known or applied value of an OMM item.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheFactory
    Factory for creating UPA ValueAdd Cache package objects.
    PayloadEntry.PayloadEntryTraceFormat
    Trace format options in which to display a decoded output of the payload entry data.

Package com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.cache Description

This package contains the UPA Value Add Cache. The Value Add Payload Cache component provides a facility for storing OMM containers (the data payload of OMM messages). Typical use of a payload cache is to store the current image of OMM data streams, where each entry in the cache corresponds to a single data stream. The initial content of a cache entry is defined by the payload of a refresh message. The current (or last) value of the entry is defined by the cumulative application of all refresh and update messages applied to the cache entry container. Values are stored in and retrieved from the cache as encoded OMM containers.
